main: ^portrait: ranger_neutral, You still remember the basics of combat, right?
^portrait: fighter_neutral, This is our HP bar
^portrait: fighter_neutral, We collapse if we run out of HP!
^portrait: fighter_neutral, This is our Mind bar. Mind is spent to use skills.
^portrait: fighter_neutral, This is our action bar. Once a member's action bar fills up, they are ready to take an action!
^portrait: ranger_neutral, The enemy also has HP bars...
^portrait: bard_neutral, You can do basic attacks or Guard, these don't consume any resources.
^portrait: bard_neutral, You can also Guard to reduce incoming damage.
^portrait: bard_neutral, You can use skills, which sometimes consume mind.
^portrait: bard_neutral, You can also use items you've collected along the way.
^portrait: magician_neutral, Got it, let's get them!
